channel.title: 816 Models

item.title: 816 Models
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

Try DatMaker.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340744.0.html

It has always worked for me. No guarantees really but its just a program i have used and trusted for aslong as i have been into 3d media.
Im sorry if this isnt what you are looking for but i hope your issue is fixed with haste.

Read full topic

item.title: 816 Models
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

hadlich4:

Is this so you can add 816 models into 317?

Again…
They are just the 816 models.
If you want to add them to your 317, you’re going to probably have some edits to do. He gave you the model read values, but there will probably be more to do.

Read full topic

item.title: 816 Models
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

b00mz1029:

That cow looks pretty legit. No model problems here.

Obviously the client will need edits, dont be so stupid and fix it yourself.

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That cow looks pretty legit. No model problems here.

Perhaps the model viewer isn’t set up to read the latest of runescapes models…
